ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say: 'Allah.' Say: 'So will you not have taqwa?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will say: "God." Say: "Then why do you not obey and fear Him?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will surely say: "Allah." Say: "Will you not, then, fear (Allah)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will quickly say, "It is God." Say, "Will you not then have fear of Him?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Thereupon they will say, “Such greatness is only that of Allah”; say, “So why do you not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will say: "Allah." Say: "Will you not then have Taqwa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They will say: (This is) Allah's. Say: Will you not then guard (against evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They will say, 'God's.' Say: 'Will you not then be godfearing?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They will say: Unto Allah (all that belongeth). Say: Will ye not then keep duty (unto Him)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will say, "They belong to God." Say, "So do you not fear Him?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will surely say: God. Say thou: will ye not then fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will say, ‘[They belong] to Allah.’ Say, ‘Will you not then be wary [of Him]?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will say, "(They belong) to Allah." Say: "Will ye not then be filled with awe?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will say: "Allah." Say: "Will you not then fear Allah (believe in His Oneness, obey Him, believe in the Resurrection and Recompense for each and every good or bad deed)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will say: 'Allah' Say: 'Will you not be cautious'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, “To God.” Say, “Will you not become righteous?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:87] They will say, ‘God’. Say: ‘Will you not then be God-fearing?’, will you then [not] be wary of worshipping [things] other than Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: They will say: Unto Allah (all that belongeth)) Allah created them. (Say) to them, Muhammad: (Will ye not then keep duty (unto Him)) will you then not avoid the worship of other than Him?
